enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.missing_d:
—未提供附魔說明—
（模组作者可以在lang中增加條目，參見《JEI Enchantment Info》模组的README）
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.bane_of_a: 增加對節肢生物的傷害並對其施加緩速IV
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.blast_pro: 減少爆炸傷害與擊退效果
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.channelin: 在雷雨時，對投擲擊中的生物劈下閃電（除非其被不透明方塊阻擋）
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.binding_c: 除非損壞或玩家死亡，防具將不可脫下（除了創造模式）
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.efficienc: 增加挖掘速度；附在斧頭上時增加破盾的機率，基礎 25%%，每升一級，機率增加 5%%
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.fire_prot: 減少火焰傷害和著火時間
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.flame.des: 箭矢將會造成生物著火
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.frost_wal: 將玩家下方的水變成冰霜（一段時間後融化）
增加對水生生物的傷害
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.loyalty.d: 投擲的三叉戟將返回手上；等級越高，花費時間越短
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.luck_of_t: 增加釣魚時獲得寶藏的機率
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.mending.d: 獲得的經驗值將轉換為物品耐久
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.multishot: 消耗一支箭可射出三隻箭矢；只能回收一支。
箭矢可以穿過多個實體
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.protectio: 每級，减少 4%% 的大部分傷害。
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.riptide.d: 將玩家向擲出三叉戟的方向發射，僅在水中或雨中生效。
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.silk_touc: 破壞的方塊會掉落自身
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.smite.des: 增加對不死生物的傷害
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.soul_spee: 提高玩家在靈魂砂和靈魂土上的移動速度。
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.thorns.de: 被攻擊時反彈部分傷害，每次反彈會消耗耐久。
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.missing_d:
--NO DESCRIPTION PROVIDED--
(mod authors can add description lang file entries; refer to the ''JEI Enchantment Info'' mod readme to see how)
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.bane_of_a: Increases damage and applies Slowness IV to arthropod mobs (spiders, cave spiders, silverfish, endermites & bees).
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.channelin: Trident "channels" a bolt of lightning during thunderstorms toward hit entities not obstructed by opaque blocks.
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.binding_c: Except when in creative mode, items cannot be removed from armor slots except due to death or breaking.
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.efficienc: Increases mining speed. When applied to an axe it increases the chance that the axe may stun a shield, with the base chance being 25%% and a 5%% increase for each level.
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.fire_prot: Reduces fire damage and burn time.
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.frost_wal: Turns water beneath the player into frosted ice.
Trident deals additional damage to mobs that spawn naturally in the ocean.
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.loyalty.d: Trident returns after being thrown. Higher levels reduce return time.
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.luck_of_t: Increases rate of good loot (enchanting books, etc.)
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.mending.d: Repair the item while gaining XP orbs.
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.multishot: Shoot 3 arrows at the cost of one; only one arrow can be recovered.
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.protectio: Reduces most types of damage by 4%% for each level.
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.riptide.d: Trident launches player with itself when thrown. Functions only in water or rain.
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.soul_spee: Increases walking speed on soul sand and soul soil.
enchantment.jeienchantmentinfo.thorns.de: Reflects some of the damage taken when hit, at the cost of reducing durability with each proc.
